name: Ancient Blood: The Order of Vampire Hunters
description:
Ancient Blood - The Order of Vampire Hunters is a cooperative story-driven game for 1 to 4 players that can be played as solo mode, as standalone games, or as a campaign. Choose a story and begin your journey. Be brave and wise, as every choice you make along your path will impact the game world. The wrong choice could awaken your most hidden fears. Fight side by side with your fellow hunters like never before using combo attacks, get help from locals using your skills,  find all the clues that will lead you to the master of each Vampires' clan, The Elder Lord.

Ancient Blood is a prequel to The Order of Vampire Hunters. It features some game mechanics inspired by the old game but it is a new game. It is not compatible with the previous one, since Ancient Blood is a story-driven game in which your decision will influence how the game develops and the end of the story. The new game features exploration, crafting, resource management, and leveling up. This time your decision will change the story of the game, so be prepared to deal with the consequences of your choices.
